title: There is a date of the last update of the terms

tosdr.case: There is a date of the last update of the terms
tosdr.tldr:
Using >curl https://hp-67.com/privacy.html on can find the last time of Terms of Service update in the EXAMPLE: curl https://hp-67.com/privacy.html HP-67.com Privacy Policy This service does not track you, HP-67.com does not collect or share personal information, including IP addresses of website visitors are not tracked. Since you never can upload anything to this website (service), "You maintain ownership of your data". There is no need to register. That is our privacy policy in a nutshell.



HP-67.com Terms of Service HP-67.com Privacy Policy
